QuestData.Title: Let Them Feast on Fear
QuestData.Description: Our grunts are strong but have no initiative. They're fighting toe-to-toe on the front lines. But an independent $c like yourself - well, someone like you can slip behind the lines and cause some real havoc deep within the enemy redoubt.$B$BCut a swath of destruction through the heart of Talrendis, $n! Slay our foes in territory they think is secure, leaving blood and fear in your wake.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fight your way across Talrendis Point, slaying 12 Talrendis Defenders and 6 Talrendis Sentinels.
QuestData.CompletionText: I trust you've left our foes in complete disarray?
QuestData.RewardText: Lok'tar ogar, $n! As they discover the bodies of their comrades they will learn that no place is safe from the fury of the horde, and their will to fight will crumble.
